errors.invalid-password: Password must have at least 6 characters
errors.fb-email-already-exists: The user is already registered. Try Sign In
errors.fb-wrong-password: The password is invalid. Check your credentials and try again
errors.fb-user-not-found: The user is not registered. Try Sign Up
errors.fb-too-many-requests: Account access temporarily disabled due to many unsuccessful login attempts. Try again later
errors.fb-other-error: An unexpected error has occurred. Try again in a few seconds
